Summary: Saw a pulsating light in sky, went inside to get camera
trends: There have been 148 other sightings in San Antonio
There was one other sighting in San Antonio on or around July 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my son went outside, I was sitting and he said what that was in the sky since the object was changing colors! I said I didn't know so went to get the camera so I can zoo in and that when we captured the images! I called my wife and other children, and they came outside and saw it also, it stayed above for 45 minutes and we went inside to look for more battery's and to show my mother in law the pics, we went back outside and it was gone!
